Here you can run Sync if there are more indexed images than what is on the device, or if there are new images on the device that are not indexed.
** Start sync will start background work managed by your device. This means you might not see its results instantly.
*** In Storage number can be lower if extraction has failed for some images.
This is information extracted for this image.\nFeel free to edit it in any manner you like. Changes made here will impact how you can search for this image moving forward.
Type below to start a search!
Tap \'Initialize\' to create albums based on most common found keywords.
Create your own albums from the search screen!
This will delete the album permanently.
Indexing is still in progress.\nSearch is disabled as your results will be incomplete.
These are suggestions based on your image data.
Looks like app data was reset.
You are about to share %1$s images. Some apps might not handle this properly.

We are couple of childhood friends and software development enthusiasts who love to work together and develop the apps which can help other people with solving their everyday tasks.\nOur motivation to create this app came from the situation where sometimes we know that we have a certain photo in our gallery, but finding it by scrolling an infinite list of thousands of small images was always annoying and inefficient.\nAfter using it in our friend group, we decided to share it publicly so that it may help others with the same problem.

Using our indexing system this app will help you to search for any content in your picture and list you all of the possible matches, which you can share and edit in a few taps. You can search for objects, texts, shapes, or any information that comes to your mind. Share, edit and embed new information to curate your searches in the future. Store desired results as albums for future reference. And the best part, all of this is done locally on your device.\n\nNo information leaves your device, ever. You own your data.
It seems that either the system or you have revoked the applications access to media.\n\nIn order to function properly, the application needs access to system media.
"Consider allowing required permissions. You can tap 'Grant Permission' to do so, and if the system does not prompt you, you will have to grant access manually by opening the system app settings. "
Sharing %1$s images. Some apps might not handle this properly.
Enable Periodic Sync to allow the app to scan your media based on a certain period. This will reduce the amount of Out of Sync warnings.
Sync runs every hour, with a flexible period of 15 minutes. It considers the devices current status. This takes into account the battery life, processing power available and heaviness of use.

%1$s is an app that helps you find your images more quickly. It does so by using a text query and searching for it in image content. This content can be text, shapes, objects, colors or any other thing that comes to your mind!

There is always that moment where an images comes to mind that you want to share with a friend, and you know what is on the image, but you simply cannot find it in the vast sea of thousands of small thumbnails in your gallery.

This is where %1$s can help.

In this day and age, we as developers of this software take the privacy of all as paramount.

The application runs fully offline and does not access the internet, nor does it have or declare the permission to. All data that is generated by this application is present only on your devices local storage. This data never leaves your device and you are free to do with it as you please.

You own your data.

In order to function properly, the application will ask you the permission to read your local media. This is a core piece of our functionality. This permission allows this application to only read, not modify this media.

By granting permission to a set of images or all of them, our application can scan and index them for terms that you can later search for. This is the only reason for which this permission is used.

You are free to turn it off at any time, just be warned that the application will not function properly and will prompt you to reinstate this permission.

When you press ‘Let’s Begin!’ the application will start an indexing process to find all the searchable information from your images. While this process is active, you will not be able to use the search functionality.\n\nIn this way, we do not ship your data to any broker, but store it on your device. Feel free to close the application while this process is active, or stick around to track the progress!
*Event logs are stored locally on your device. You decide if you want to share them. Tap the ℹ for more.

Tell us about your experience with our app and any changes or features you would like to see.\n\nSomething unexpected happened? Describe the event, or just send us the logs and we will take it from there.
Let us know what you think!

Event logs are created while you use the application. They keep a record of crucial events that have happened, like failed extractions for images or records of crashes. These help us identify the sequence of events that took place before a bug happened.\n\nEvent logs do not contain any identifiable info and may only include rudimentary information about your device, such as the amount of processing cores. They are appended to the email, so feel free to read them first.
Search through your gallery and find your memories!\nUse text to search over the contents of your photos.
In order to function properly, we need permission to view your images.
All information found on your images is stored locally and never leaves your device.\n\nYou own your data.
You have used all your allocated searches.
See how you can get more.

*We don\'t store any info about your purchases. That means any searches purchased are stored only on your device. Should you uninstall the app we\'ll try our best to restore your searches using Google Plays purchase history.
You can also support us directly and not watch ads by selecting one of the options below.*
You can get 100 searches by viewing a full screen ad that lasts 5 seconds. This will provide a kickback to us, and allow you to keep using the app for free.
Indexing is still active. When finished, you can create albums based on most common keywords.
